Save up to five **(5) billers on GCash**, including their name and account number, for faster and error-free payments. There is no need to re-enter details every time you pay bills with saved billers.

### **How to add or save your favorite billers:**

1. On your GCash App, tap Bills > **Add Biller**

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/40558116131865)

2. Choose your biller from the category or search for it
3. Enter the required details and tap **Next**
4. Review biller details and tap **Save**

Once saved, the biller will appear in your Saved Billers list under the Pay Bills section of the GCash app.

You can now select the biller, enter the amount, and proceed with payment.
